summary: Project is a complete iOS app (DemocratDollar) with SwiftUI frontend, Firebase Firestore backend, and Node.js FEC data updater. All core components are built: iOS app with models/views/viewmodels, data pipeline (FEC API -> categorize -> Firebase push), Firebase config with Firestore rules, launchd scheduled updates, icon generation, App Store screenshots, setup docs, and privacy policy. No .planning/ directory exists â€” no pending roadmap or phases.
nextSteps: App Store submission checklist (physical device testing, screenshots on required sizes, App Store description, age rating, privacy policy URL). Consider adding tests, CI/CD, or additional features if desired.
